create.desc: Triggered each time a submission is created.

passClearance.desc: Triggered each time user passes clearance and is able to proceed with filling out the rest of the form.

failClearance.desc: Triggered each time clearance prevents user from filling out the rest of the form.

edit.desc: Triggered when a submission is openned for editing

review.desc: Triggered when a submission is open for review

knockout.desc: Triggered each time a submission is knocked out.

quoted.desc: Triggered each time a submission is quoted.

error.desc: There was an error with quote / knockout
